item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Not really. While it COULD be because it's a simple initial without any emotion charged to it, it really doesn't make sense for an oblique reference like that to go in, where it is focussed on another language's phrasing. Her name is Kurenai YÅ«hi, and McM likes to make puns off character traits- like how she seems to be a bit of a sex-goddess, and is the first woman in Naruto to get pregnant (implying something obvious).

item.title: Possible reference?
item.content:encoded: K.Y. also could mean Kuuki Yomenai, reading the atmosphere, not understanding someone else's feelings or a situation and acts/speaks improperly.
